room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: So much fun! I went with a group of 6 people for my birthday and it was a blast! We did the kidnap room. Highly recommend! The staff is super friendly and the place is great.

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: We had so much fun in the kidnap room! Can't wait to go back for The Hustle!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: It was our very first time doing an escape room. We did it as a family, had an awesome time. Escape the kidnapped room with eight minutes to spare. Highly suggest it!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: We did the Kidnapped room with a part of 7. It was an awesome time and definitely makes you think and work as a team. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Kidnapped" by Escape Room Adventure in Daytona Beach
review: I was totally surprised! Really clever and fun I would recommend this for any group (couples, coworkers, friends) it was hilarious and full of adrenaline!!
